thought.text: Let me try running the tests using the sympy test runner instead:

action.command:
cd /tmp/tmpyjyraizy/sympy && python -c "
import sympy
from sympy.printing.tests.test_str import *
from sympy import MatrixSymbol

# Test basic MatAdd functionality
A = MatrixSymbol('A', 2, 2)
B = MatrixSymbol('B', 2, 2)

# Test that our changes don't break existing functionality
expr = A + B
print('A + B:', str(expr))

expr = A - B  
print('A - B:', str(expr))

expr = A + B + A
print('A + B + A:', str(expr))

print('Basic tests passed!')
"

# Test that our changes don't break existing functionality
